> http://gladiators.kamioekaki.com
 
> http://www.kamioekaki.com/gladiators/
 
> It's a start. Meh. I did it in about 20 minutes, bleh eh? Any
 suggestions on what I should add? Also, join the forums if you can.
 Thanks!

To be honest, we don't need any new forums.  Between sourceforge and
yahoo groups, we have enough forums.

If you want some more stuff to add, start backing up the scenarios
stored in the files section here.

Also, I started to do character reviews on web pages, in the files
section here, but I never finished.

Original screen shots would be nice.  I'll see about emailing you all
the stuff you would need to do back-ups of my html maps.  Most of it
is images converted to gif formats.
